Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrm_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Array of active probes alarms. If the probe is passive, its alarm is triggered after the delay when the channel has a ChipIO error.

Variable.Name: AddrExt_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Offset of cpCOe, from 15 to 232 (Modbus) or 192 (Carel)

Variable.Name: MasterTypIn
Variable.Comment: Type of master connected (0=16 bit, 1=32 bit)

Variable.Name: SafeModeDT
Variable.Comment: Delay time to wait before to enter in safe mode in milliseconds

Variable.Name: PrbOff
Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: UpdThrsh
Variable.Comment: Minimum variation to make the slave notify the change to the master (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: EnSafeMode
Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze output, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: OfflinePattern
Variable.Comment: Pattern in case of offline if EnSafeMode=TRUE

Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrmDT
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Active probe alarm delay time

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinDelta
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum variation to get during MinPeriod to avoid to trigger active probe alarm

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinPeriod
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum period in which probe value must change at least of MinDelta, otherwise active probe alarm is triggered

Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Comment: Calculates the satus of the communication

Variable.Name: ErrExtPositTable
Variable.Comment: Error in the External position table

Variable.Name: Online
Variable.Comment: Indicates that the block is enabled, the communication is on and device is working correctly

Variable.Name: DevAddr_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Address of cpCOe, from 1 to 15. Use 207 to go online with cpCOe in set mode.

Variable.Name: SafeModeDT
Variable.Comment: Delay time to wait before to enter in safe mode in milliseconds

Variable.Name: PrbOff
Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: UpdThrsh
Variable.Comment: Minimum variation to make the slave notify the change to the master (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: EnSafeMode
Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze output, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: OfflinePattern
Variable.Comment: Pattern in case of offline if EnSafeMode=TRUE

Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrmDT
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Active probe alarm delay time

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinDelta
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum variation to get during MinPeriod to avoid to trigger active probe alarm

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinPeriod
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum period in which probe value must change at least of MinDelta, otherwise active probe alarm is triggered

Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Comment: Delay in ms in which out is on (for types 2 and 3)

Variable.Name: TOutOff
Variable.Comment: Delay in ms in which out is off (for types 2 and 3)

Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze outputs, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: TOutOn
Variable.Comment: Delay in ms in which out is on (for types 2 and 3)

Variable.Name: TOutOff
Variable.Comment: Delay in ms in which out is off (for types 2 and 3)

Variable.Name: EnSafeMode
Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze outputs, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: OfflinePattern
Variable.Comment: Pattern in case of offline if EnSafeMode=TRUE

Variable.Name: DevInfo_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Informations about cpCOe device (available only when online)

Variable.Name: FwVersionH
Variable.Comment: Version of firmware running on cpCOe, first part

Variable.Name: FwVersionL
Variable.Comment: Version of firmware running on cpCOe, second part

Variable.Name: FwDate
Variable.Comment: Date of firmware running on cpCOe

Variable.Name: En_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Enables the block and the communication

Variable.Name: EnCfgTable
Variable.Comment: Enables communication table to configure cpCOe

Variable.Name: EnExtPositTable
Variable.Comment: Enables communication table to read and write from valve of cpCOe

Variable.Name: EnIOTable
Variable.Comment: Enables communication table to read and write from cpCOe

Variable.Name: EnStartUpTable
Variable.Comment: Enables communication table to initialize cpCOe

Variable.Name: Errors_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Array of ChipIO errors for universal channels

Variable.Name: ExtPosit_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Variable added for c.pCOe Enhanced valve management

Variable.Name: ExtPositIn_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Variable added for c.pCOe Enhanced valve management

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK changes from TRUE to FALSE. FALSE if all other cases

Variable.Name: LastPollTime
Variable.Comment: Last polling loop time from configuration

Variable.Name: MasterTypRead
Variable.Comment: Type of master currently set, 16/32-Bit table (0=16, 1=32)

Variable.Name: Online_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Indicates that the block is enabled, the communication is on and device is working correctly.

Variable.Name: ThrshWarnPollTime_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Warning of exceed the max Polling time

Variable.Name: ValIn_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Values to be sent to cpCOe. Only outputs are considered.

Variable.Name: ValOut_CPCOE
Variable.Comment: Values coming from cpCOe. Only inputs are considered. Outputs take the same values of ValsIn. In case of block disabled, all inputs are set to 0 or FALSE.
